ITEM.TEXT: MT : Run as master of a Task
Event raised to let submit program
Job ID to use in the submit
Job Name to use in the submit
Thread Number of the curren submit

ITEM.SOURCE: ` lock_exclusive( ). * Lock released with commit. UPDATE ygplmt_runs SET blocs = bloc_count WHERE run_id = process_id. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.
` * CHECK infos-bloc_size <> bloc_size. * f_has_changed = abap_true. * infos-bloc_size = bloc_size.

` * DATA o_msg TYPE to_messaging. * DATA it_list TYPE ygpl_mt_job_monitoring=>tt_joblist. * DATA s_condition TYPE ts_running_conditions. * FIELD-SYMBOLS <j> LIKE LINE OF task_list. * * CHECK me->max_memory <> max_memory. * o_job_monitoring->check_active_threads( ). * IF o_job_monitoring->threads > 0. ** Task running * it_list = o_job_monitoring->get_job_list( ). * IF LINES( it_list ) > LINES( task_list ). ** Lock required * ASSERT 0 = 1. " #TO_do * ENDIF. * LOOP AT task_list ASSIGNING <j>. * s_condition-max_memory = max_memory. ** Send message ** #TO_do ** CREATE OBJECT o_msg ** EXPORTING ** process_id = <j>-process_id ** o_categories = o_categories. * o_msg->send_system_message( category = system_categories-condition * message = s_condition ). * ENDLOOP. * ENDIF. * me->max_memory = max_memory.

` * DATA it_list TYPE ygpl_mt_job_monitoring=>tt_joblist. * DATA nb_stop TYPE i. * FIELD-SYMBOLS <j> LIKE LINE OF task_list. * * CHECK o_job_monitoring IS BOUND. * CHECK infos-threads <> thread_count. * f_has_changed = abap_true. * IF o_job_monitoring->threads = 0. * infos-threads = thread_count. * ELSE. * nb_stop = infos-threads - thread_count. * IF nb_stop < 0. * ASSERT 0 = 1. " # To do * ELSE. ** Task running * it_list = o_job_monitoring->get_job_list( ). * IF LINES( task_list ) < nb_stop. ** Lock required * ASSERT 0 = 1. " # To do * ENDIF. ** To improve * LOOP AT task_list ASSIGNING <j> TO nb_stop. * stop_task( <j>-process_id ). * ENDLOOP. * ENDIF. * ENDIF.
` * me->weight_fn = weight_fn.

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA length TYPE i. DATA o_msg TYPE to_messaging.
super->constructor( ).
length = XSTRLEN( run_id ). * ASSERT factory_mode IS NOT INITIAL OR length = 16. ASSERT run_id IS INITIAL OR length = 16.
IF run_id IS INITIAL. ELSE. me->process_id = run_id. read( ). ENDIF.
IF o_messaging IS BOUND. set_messaging( o_messaging ). me->o_messaging->set_process( me ). ELSE. o_msg ?= ygpl_mt_factories=>get_messaging( me ). set_messaging( o_msg ). ENDIF. IF o_informations IS BOUND. me->o_informations ?= o_informations. me->o_informations->set_process( me ). ELSE. me->o_informations ?= ygpl_mt_factories=>get_messaging( me ). ENDIF.

` DATA d_cond_ser TYPE td_serialized. Data o_cond type to_conditions. _get_information( EXPORTING category = system_categories-condition CHANGING info = d_cond_ser ). o_cond ?= ygpl_mt_factories=>create_new_start_conditions( ). o_cond->deserialize( d_cond_ser ). set_conditions( o_cond ).

`
lock_exclusive( ). * Lock released with commit. UPDATE ygplmt_runs SET blocs = bloc_count WHERE run_id = process_id. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.

ITEM.TEXT: Requested size of bloc counted in weight unit if provided

ITEM.SOURCE: ` * CHECK infos-bloc_size <> bloc_size. * f_has_changed = abap_true. * infos-bloc_size = bloc_size.
` ASSERT object IS BOUND. ygplimt_parent~conditions = o_conditions = object.

ITEM.TEXT: Maximum memory size task might use

ITEM.SOURCE: ` * DATA o_msg TYPE to_messaging. * DATA it_list TYPE ygpl_mt_job_monitoring=>tt_joblist. * DATA s_condition TYPE ts_running_conditions. * FIELD-SYMBOLS <j> LIKE LINE OF task_list. * * CHECK me->max_memory <> max_memory. * o_job_monitoring->check_active_threads( ). * IF o_job_monitoring->threads > 0. ** Task running * it_list = o_job_monitoring->get_job_list( ). * IF LINES( it_list ) > LINES( task_list ). ** Lock required * ASSERT 0 = 1. " #TO_do * ENDIF. * LOOP AT task_list ASSIGNING <j>. * s_condition-max_memory = max_memory. ** Send message ** #TO_do ** CREATE OBJECT o_msg ** EXPORTING ** process_id = <j>-process_id ** o_categories = o_categories. * o_msg->send_system_message( category = system_categories-condition * message = s_condition ). * ENDLOOP. * ENDIF. * me->max_memory = max_memory.
` ASSERT object IS BOUND. ygplimt_parent~messaging = o_messaging = object.

` * DATA it_list TYPE ygpl_mt_job_monitoring=>tt_joblist. * DATA nb_stop TYPE i. * FIELD-SYMBOLS <j> LIKE LINE OF task_list. * * CHECK o_job_monitoring IS BOUND. * CHECK infos-threads <> thread_count. * f_has_changed = abap_true. * IF o_job_monitoring->threads = 0. * infos-threads = thread_count. * ELSE. * nb_stop = infos-threads - thread_count. * IF nb_stop < 0. * ASSERT 0 = 1. " # To do * ELSE. ** Task running * it_list = o_job_monitoring->get_job_list( ). * IF LINES( task_list ) < nb_stop. ** Lock required * ASSERT 0 = 1. " # To do * ENDIF. ** To improve * LOOP AT task_list ASSIGNING <j> TO nb_stop. * stop_task( <j>-process_id ). * ENDLOOP. * ENDIF. * ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Change the field name of weight field
Weight Fieldname in object data table

ITEM.SOURCE: ` * me->weight_fn = weight_fn.
` o_informations->get_information( EXPORTING category = category CHANGING info = info ).

` DATA _key TYPE string. DATA user TYPE sy-uname.
ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>check_lock_mode( lock_mode ).
ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>set_timeout_timestamp( timeout ). DO. CALL FUNCTION 'ENQUEUE_EYGPLMT_RUNS' EXPORTING mode_ygplmt_runs = lock_mode mandt = sy-mandt run_id = process_id x_run_id = abap_true _scope = '2' _wait = abap_true _collect = ' ' EXCEPTIONS foreign_lock = 1 system_failure = 2 OTHERS = 3. IF sy-subrc = 1. IF ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>check_timeout( ) IS INITIAL. CONTINUE. ELSE. user = sy-msgv1. _key = process_id. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_locks EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_locks=>foreign_lock object_name = 'MT Process Data'(tds) object_key = _key user = user. ENDIF. * else if sy-subrc <> 0. ELSE. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0. ENDIF. CALL FUNCTION 'YGPL_RELEASE_LOCK_ON_COMMIT'. EXIT. ENDDO.
` o_messaging->send_message( archive = archive category = category message = message ).
` o_informations->set_information( category = category info = info ).

` ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>check_lock_mode( lock_mode ).
CALL FUNCTION 'DEQUEUE_EYGPLMT_RUNS' EXPORTING mode_ygplmt_runs = lock_mode mandt = sy-mandt run_id = process_id x_run_id = abap_true _scope = '2' _synchron = ' ' _collect = ' '.
` *CALL METHOD SUPER->IS_SYSTEM_MESSAGE_ALLOWED * RECEIVING * RESULT = * .
` super->lock_exclusive( ). _lock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-write process_id = me->process_id ).
` super->lock_with_share( ). _lock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-read process_id = me->process_id ).

` DATA _run TYPE ygplmt_runs.
* Do the lock super->read( ).
SELECT SINGLE * INTO _run FROM ygplmt_runs WHERE run_id = process_id. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.
read_condtions( ).
unlock_with_share( ).
times-start = _run-timestamp. MOVE-CORRESPONDING _run TO infos. status = _run-status.
` _unlock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-write process_id = me->process_id ). super->unlock_exclusive( ) .
` _unlock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-read process_id = me->process_id ). super->unlock_with_share( ).
